author: shv
msg: Update credits with uniform affiliation for shv.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Renamed the org.apache.sis.util.type package to org.apache.sis.util.iso.
This is consistent with org.apache.sis.metadata.iso. Actually, even the
InternationalString interface can be considered (loosely) as ISO since
it is closely related to the <gmd:textGroup> XML element.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6003: Create row templates outside of the generated code
Make SortResultSet, VTIResultSet, aggregates and WindowResultSet use an
ExecRowBuilder instead of a generated method to allocate row templates.
